Title: Model-Based Input Validation for Preventing Prompt Injection Attacks
Abstract:
As Large Language Models (LLMs) become increasingly integrated into various applications, the threat of prompt injection attacks has emerged as a significant security concern. This presentation introduces a novel model-based input validation approach to mitigate these attacks in LLM-integrated applications.

We present a meta-prompt methodology that acts as an intermediate validator, examining user inputs before they reach the LLM. Our approach builds on established input validation techniques, drawing parallels with traditional security measures like SQL injection prevention.

Throughout the presentation, we will discuss the challenges of input validation in LLM contexts and explore how our model-based approach provides a more flexible and adaptive solution. We'll share preliminary results from evaluations against established prompt injection datasets, highlighting the effectiveness of our methodology in detecting and mitigating various types of injection attempts.

Join us for an insightful exploration of this innovative approach to enhancing the security of LLM applications through advanced prompt engineering techniques, and learn how to implement robust input validation mechanisms to safeguard your AI-driven systems.

Title: AI Orchestration: Getting Super Agents to Complete a Mission
Abstract: I will discuss how AI agents can be orchestrated to manage a business, particularly for individuals with side hustles. The focus will be on leveraging AI to "multiply efforts." I will also address safety concerns, challenges, and potential solutions to overcome these obstacles.

Title: Algorithmic Red Teaming and Prompt Engineering
Abstract: Learn how to use LLMs and agentic workflows to create prompts to validate generative AI applications for functionality, accuracy, safety, and security. Learn about tools, techniques, and practical strategies.

Title: AI-Driven Conversational Agents in Search
Abstract: Discover how AI-driven conversational agents are transforming search by enabling natural, intuitive interactions. This talk explores their architecture, benefits, and real-world applications, revealing how these agents enhance search experiences and shape the future of information retrieval.

Title: Predictive Network Maintenance: How AI Forecasts System Failures
Abstract: Imagine a world where network outages are nearly obsolete, and system failures are predicted before they happen. In my talk, Predictive Network Maintenance: How AI Forecasts System Failures, I’ll show how AI predicts issues and suggests preventive actions, saving time and costs.

Title: GepAI in Development Processes and Dev Tools
Abstract: Let me show you how GepAI can revolutionize your development process. By automating coding, debugging, and deployments, your team can focus on innovation, launch faster, and reduce errors. In just a few minutes, I'll explain how GepAI unlocks your team’s full potential.

Title: Optimizing Retail Forecasting Through Advanced AI Models: The Role of Prompt Engineering
Abstract: Unlock the future of retail with AI-powered forecasting! Discover how prompt engineering revolutionizes demand prediction, boosts customer experience, and slashes costs. Learn from industry giants like Amazon and Kroger to stay ahead in an ever-changing market with cutting-edge predictive models!

Title: Prompt Engineering in Reinforcement Learning: AI-Driven Assessments for Continuous Learning and Skill Development
Abstract: Unlock the future of learning with reinforcement learning (RL) and AI-driven assessments! Discover how prompt engineering powers personalized, adaptive learning journeys that boost engagement, retention, and mastery.

JobTitle1: Product Owner, Conversational AI, HR Transformation Department
Title: Unlocking the Future of HR Tech: How to Build Intelligent Conversational AI Experiences
Abstract: Unlock the future of HR with AI! In How to Build Intelligent Conversational AI Experiences, I'll show you how to harness chatbots and virtual assistants to transform recruitment, onboarding, and employee engagement—making your HR processes smarter, faster, and more human-centric.

Title: Prompt Engineering: Mastering the Art and Science of AI Communication
Abstract: Unlock the secrets behind crafting effective AI prompts that power everything from chatbots to code generation. Learn real-world techniques and best practices to optimize interactions with AI models, whether you're a developer, product manager, or tech enthusiast.

Title: How you can trick your company into hiring ChatGPT
Abstract: I had my company hire "Chet Gupta," aka ChatGPT—a model software engineer with a fantastic resume and perfect answers that doesn’t exist. In this talk, we will walk through the circumstances that allowed this to happen.

Title: Azure AI Prompt Flow, Vectors & Embeddings: End-to-End Chatbot Web App with Your Own Data
Abstract: Join our workshop on the future of intelligent chatbot development! Seamlessly integrate Azure Cosmos DB for vectorization, leverage Hugging Face, and craft Prompt Flows within React. This workshop is designed for all audiences looking to learn chatbot development skills and AI development.

Title: Optimizing Cloud Efficiency with AI-Powered Prompt Engineering: Cost-Effective Strategies for Cloud-Native Platforms
Abstract: Unlock the full potential of your cloud-native platform with AI-powered cost optimization! Discover cutting-edge strategies to slash cloud waste, enhance resource efficiency, and achieve up to 35% cost savings—all without sacrificing performance or scalability.

Title: Harnessing Cloud Technologies for Intelligent Healthcare Solutions: A Data-Centric Perspective
Abstract: Discover how advanced cloud technologies and AI are transforming healthcare! This session unveils innovative strategies that boost productivity, cut costs, and enhance patient outcomes. Learn to leverage CI/CD, Kubernetes, and neural networks for smarter data management and streamlined processes.

Title: Optimizing IT Performance in Complex Systems: The Role of AI and Prompt Engineering
Abstract: Unlock the power of AI-driven prompt engineering to solve IT's most persistent challenge: performance optimization. Learn how to overcome bottlenecks in complex systems, from cloud to IoT, with cutting-edge AI techniques that accelerate diagnostics and boost efficiency.

Title: Mastering Cost Efficiency and Resilience with Advanced Multi-Cloud Strategies
Abstract: Unlock the secrets to mastering multi-cloud strategies! Discover how to slash cloud costs by 90%, achieve 93% less downtime, and boost resilience. Dive into advanced optimization techniques, leverage diverse cloud services, and tackle multi-cloud challenges with cutting-edge solutions. Don’t miss out!

Title: Prompt Engineering: Challenges, Considerations, and Best Practices
Abstract: Prompt engineering is a crucial skill for effective AI interaction. This talk explores challenges like ambiguity and bias, key considerations, and best practices such as clear instructions and iterative refinement. Learn to craft prompts that elicit accurate, relevant AI responses.

Title: How I Prompted AI to Build a Pregnancy App I Could Trust
Abstract: Tired of pregnancy apps selling out your privacy? Join me to discover how I used AI to build a truly secure maternal health app. Learn about privacy pitfalls, AI-guided development, and open-source tools that put moms in control.

Title: The Expanding Reach of AI: Exploring Benefits and Challenges Across Different Areas
Abstract: Explore how AI revolutionizes efficiency and personalization, yet poses challenges like job displacement and privacy concerns. My research navigates AI's dual impacts, aiming for an ethical, inclusive future.

JobTitle1: Business Program Manager - Azure Technical Trainer
Title: Exploring Copilot Capabilities
Abstract: Copilot is the big announcement of 2024 within Microsoft. For some, it's just a fancy Bing search; for others, it's their new friend, colleague, and peer tutor. Learn in this session from Peter De Tender, Technical Trainer at Microsoft Redmond, what Copilot can do for you in your day-to-day job.

JobTitle1: Senior Vice President, Head of Banking & European FinTech Business
Title: Ethical Dimensions of AI in Educational Technology: Navigating Innovation with Accountability, Privacy, and Equity
Abstract: Join me in exploring the ethical frontier of AI in education! Discover how innovative technologies can revolutionize learning while addressing critical issues like privacy, equity, and accountability. Together, we’ll uncover actionable strategies to ensure a fair and transparent educational landscape.

Title: Digital and Ethical Issues Around Natural Language Processing
Abstract: In this talk, I’ll discuss and teach the intersection of technology and ethics in the realm of natural language processing. We'll explore the transformative power of AI while addressing critical ethical concerns, from data privacy to algorithmic bias.

Title: Ethical AI Through Prompt Engineering: Mitigating Bias and Reducing Hallucinations in Conversational Systems
Abstract: Join us for a deep dive into prompt engineering and discover how to combat AI's biggest challenges: bias and hallucination. Learn cutting-edge techniques like Chain of Thought and MRKL to enhance accuracy and inclusivity in AI, making your applications smarter and more reliable.

Title: Optimizing AI Interactions: Techniques in Prompt Engineering for Enhanced Model Performance
Abstract: I would like to share my experience and knowledge regarding prompt engineering with different GenAI tools.

Title: Real-Time Data for Generative Feedback Loop (GFL) Automation
Abstract: Explore diverse real-world applications of GFL across different industries.

Title: What I Wish I'd Known as a Developer About Prompt Engineering
Abstract: Fantastic! You're working to add generative AI capabilities to your application! But context is key when working with these models. Thus, there are some important aspects that application developers should know about prompt engineering. I'll explain this and showcase a hands-on demo—come join!

Title: Codeless Generative AI Pipelines: Prompt Automation
Abstract: By utilizing a real-time streaming tool such as Apache NiFi, you can automate all of your prompt building and make data engineering for GenAI a snap.

Title: Inside Multimodal Models
Abstract: In this session, we will dive into the intricacies of multimodal AI, exploring its mechanisms and the necessity for such advanced systems in today's digital landscape. We'll discuss how these models process and analyze diverse data streams to create a cohesive understanding of user inputs.

Title: Can LLMs Understand the Linux Kernel? An LLM-Powered Approach to Understanding Large Codebases
Abstract: Feel lost in massive codebases like the kernel? RAG and fine-tuning fall short on some questions. Since development is a social event, what if we could survey every developer about each commit? With Code-Survey, we treat AI as survey participants, turning unstructured data into actionable insights.

Title: From Proof of Concept to Production: Practical Strategies for Implementing Domain-Specific LLMs
Abstract: Unlock the power of Large Language Models! I'll share insights on fine-tuning vs. Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), reveal best practices, and discuss key lessons from real-world use cases. Learn how to take models like LLaMA 2 and GPT-4 from POC to production for real impact.

Title: Turning AI into API: Extracting Structured Data from Images with OCR and LLM
Abstract: Discover how combining OCR with LLMs can transform unstructured image data into structured, usable formats. This talk demonstrates building AI pipelines to automate data extraction, improve workflows, and enhance decision-making, turning visual information into business-ready insights.

Title: Meta-Search in Real Estate: Streamlining Property Search Across Multiple Platforms with Machine Learning
Abstract: Discover how a meta-search platform, enhanced with machine learning, consolidates real estate listings from multiple sources into a single, accurate feed. It eliminates duplicate entries, personalizes searches, and provides full market visibility for consumers and businesses alike.

Title: Leveraging Machine Learning to Create a Reliable Anti-Fraud System
Abstract: For FinTech companies with high turnover, fraud and abusive customer behavior are common challenges that degrade product quality or exploit vulnerabilities. I propose a framework with key strategies that achieve 80% success with just 20% effort, effectively combating unwanted user actions.

Title: AI-Powered Digital Product Management: The Smart Shortcut from Idea to Market-Ready Solution
Abstract: AI is turning product management upside down. Imagine using AI to draft PRDs, create mockups, and run surveys in a fraction of the time, while machine learning predicts user behavior. I’ll show you how AI helps product teams move faster, launch smarter, and create personalized user experiences.

Title: Revolutionizing Prompt Engineering with Adaptive User Interfaces: Enhancing Dynamic Interaction through Data-Driven Design
Abstract: Discover how Adaptive User Interfaces (AUIs) are transforming prompt engineering! Learn how data-driven, dynamic interfaces personalize user experiences, improve engagement by 40%, and boost performance across industries. Join us to explore cutting-edge techniques and actionable strategies!

Title: The Disruptive Potential of On-Device Large Language Models
Abstract: Discover the game-changing potential of on-device large language models! Learn how innovations from Apple, Mistral AI, and Google Gemma 2B are reshaping AI, optimizing performance, reducing costs, and enhancing privacy. Imagine a world with human-like conversations—right on your device!

Title: AI-Powered Personalization: Crafting Hyper-Relevant User Experiences
Abstract: In this talk, I’ll share how I’ve used AI to create personalized, real-time user experiences. I’ll cover key techniques, challenges, and how AI helps tailor seamless, relevant interactions that boost engagement and loyalty.

Title: A Large Language Model Took Me on Vacation
Abstract: Discover how AI vacation planning unlocks advanced prompting techniques for coding and problem-solving. Learn to master context, explore "Indirect Conversation," and elevate your AI interactions for smarter web applications and seamless user experiences.

Title: The Power of AI is in Effective Prompting
Abstract: The secret to getting things done and achieving desired results is through effective communication. The key to unlocking the full potential of AI models is by crafting precise and thoughtful prompts and guiding the AI to generate exactly the output you need.

Title: Prompt Engineering Simplified
Abstract: Everything is going well until a prompt that usually works suddenly goes off the rails. Sound familiar? Prompts can be tricky, and models are non-deterministic, but with a few prompt engineering basics, you can regain control, improve consistency, and achieve more reliable outputs with AI.

Title: Enhancing Drug Launch Success Through Prompt-Driven Sales Data Analytics in the Pharmaceutical Industry
Abstract: Unlock the power of prompt-driven sales data analytics to revolutionize drug launches in the pharmaceutical industry! Learn how precise prompts can predict market demand, boost prescription rates by 30%, and drive real-time agility.

JobTitle1: Digital and App Innovation Business Lead, Western Europe
Title: Prompt Engineering: An Art, a Science, or Your Next Job Title?
Abstract: I will introduce prompt engineering as an emerging discipline with its own methodologies, tools, and best practices. Expect lots of examples that will help you write ideal prompts for all occasions.

Title: Harnessing AI-Driven Prompts for Enhanced System Reliability: A Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) Perspective
Abstract: Unlock the power of AI-driven prompts in Site Reliability Engineering! Discover how cutting-edge AI and prompt engineering are transforming reliability, scalability, and performance. Dive into real-world strategies and tools that will revolutionize how you build resilient, high-performing systems!

Title: From Prompts to Automation: GPTScript and Fabric
Abstract: Unlock the power of GPTScript—turn your prompts into full-fledged automation! From running CLI commands to managing APIs, GPTScript lets you control your workflows using plain language. Join my talk to see how this game-changing tool makes complex tasks effortless.

Title: Strengthening AI-Driven Systems with Zero Trust Architecture: A Prompt-Engineering Approach to Secure Modern Applications
Abstract: Unlock the future of secure AI-driven systems! Discover how Zero Trust Architecture transforms modern applications by eliminating implicit trust and leveraging AI, blockchain, and quantum-resistant cryptography. Learn strategies that reduce vulnerabilities by 50%.

Title: Optimizing AI Workflows with Kafka, Secure Proxies, and Modern Architectures in Prompt Engineering
Abstract: Unlock the full potential of prompt engineering with real-time AI workflows powered by Apache Kafka! Discover how to process millions of prompts per second, ensure top-tier security with zero-trust architecture, and optimize your AI pipelines.

Title: A Framework for Securing IoT Integrations with Third-Party Services Across Critical Sectors
Abstract:
The exponential growth of the Internet of Things (IoT) ecosystem, which saw 3.4 billion cellular IoT connections in 2023, has enabled seamless integration between IoT applications and third-party services across industries such as smart cities, healthcare, and automotive. This integration has delivered significant functional and efficiency benefits but also introduced critical security challenges. Our framework addresses these challenges, particularly focusing on secure authentication, authorization, and communication to protect sensitive data across its lifecycle. For example, integrating third-party analytics in smart city applications has proven to reduce crime rates by up to 40% and optimize emergency response times by 35%, yet it necessitates robust security mechanisms to maintain data integrity. In healthcare, the use of IoT in patient monitoring can drastically improve chronic disease management but requires stringent API security and data privacy protocols.

We propose a comprehensive model emphasizing multi-factor authentication, token-based systems like JSON Web Tokens (JWT), and end-to-end encryption using AES-256. Case studies, such as the SmartSantander project, demonstrate our model’s effectiveness, highlighting a 20% reduction in urban air pollution and a 25% decrease in parking-related traffic congestion. Additionally, we explore emerging trends like 5G-driven connectivity and edge intelligence, which are projected to process 75% of enterprise-generated data locally by 2025, enhancing real-time decision-making and data privacy.

Our approach balances the drive for innovation with rigorous security measures, offering best practices for organizations seeking to leverage third-party integrations while ensuring data privacy and protection. This work provides a valuable roadmap for IoT stakeholders, emphasizing the ongoing need for adaptive, resilient security strategies to safeguard evolving IoT ecosystems.

Title: Testing LLM-Powered Applications
Abstract: LLMs, large language models, are one of the most impressive pieces of tech we've had in a long time. But from a developer's viewpoint, LLMs are kind of a nightmare to test, aren't they? In this talk, I adapt traditional testing methodologies like TDD and BDD to the realm of LLM-powered applications.

Title: Prompt Engineering for Test Automation: Enhancing AI-Driven Quality Assurance
Abstract: Discover how prompt engineering can revolutionize test automation by improving the accuracy, speed, and reliability of AI-driven quality assurance in modern software development pipelines.
